team_uuid.description: Unique identifier for the team this bucket

bucket_id.description: The id of the bucket to associate this environment with.

emails.description: A list of settings for sending email notifications upon completion of a test run using this environment. Emails block is documented below

initial_variables.description: Map of keys and values being used for variables when the test begins.

integrations.description: A list of integration ids to enable for test runs using this environment.

preserve_cookies.description: If this is set to true, tests using this enviornment will manage cookies between steps.

regions.description: A list of Runscope regions to execute test runs in when using this environment.

remote_agents.description: A list of Remote Agents to execute test runs in when using this environment.

test_id.description: The id of the test to associate this environment with.

webhooks.description: A list of URL's to send results to when test runs using this environment finish.

bucket_id.description: The id of the bucket to associate this schedule with.

environment_id.description: The id of the environment to use when running the test.

interval.description: The schedule's interval, must be one of:

note.description: A human-friendly description for the schedule.

test_id.description: The id of the test to associate this schedule with.

bucket_id.description: The id of the bucket to associate this step with.

note.description: = (Optional) A comment attached to the test step.

test_id.description: The id of the test to associate this step with.

description.description: Human-readable description of the new test.
